body: I loved it. But the person who wrote this must have not been thinking right. "Men only feel pleasure when they cum?" Well I guess my penis has malfunctioned because I feel pleasure while I masturbate... it's kinda the fucking point of masturbation. And Hibiki did nothing wrong when he jacked off to the other girl, it's not like they were in a relationship and Diita even watched him fuck two other girls without any problems. That's just bad writing.
